    • Method Detail

      • assertAndGetCardContent

        public CardContent assertAndGetCardContent​(Long cardContentId)
        Retrieve the card content. If not found, throw a HttpErrorMessage.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        Returns:
        the card content if found
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the card content was not found

      • assertAndGetGrandParentCardContent

        public CardContent assertAndGetGrandParentCardContent​(Card card)
        Retrieve the grand parent card content of the given card.
        Parameters:
        card - the card
        Returns:
        the grand parent card content of the given card
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if any of the level was not found

      • assertCardContentReadWrite

        public void assertCardContentReadWrite​(Long id)
        Get the card content identified by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the card to access
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the document was not found or access denied

      • createNewCardContent

        public CardContent createNewCardContent​(Long cardId)
        Complete and persist a new card content variant for the given card.

        Also create its default resource references.

        Parameters:
        cardId - the id of the card needing a new card content variant
        Returns:
        a new, initialized and persisted card content

      • initNewCardContentForCard

        public CardContent initNewCardContentForCard​(Card card)
        Initialize a new card content which will be a content of the given card.
        Parameters:
        card - the card needing a new card content
        Returns:
        a new, initialized card content (just the object, no persistence)

      • resetProgression

        public void resetProgression​(CardContent cardContent)
        Reset progression data of the given card content : status, completion level and frozen
        Parameters:
        cardContent - the card content

      • changeCardContentLexicalConversionStatus

        public void changeCardContentLexicalConversionStatus​(Long id,
                                                     ConversionStatus status)
        Set the lexical conversion status.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card content
        status - the new lexical conversion status to set

      • deleteCardContent

        public void deleteCardContent​(Long cardContentId)
        Delete the given card content
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content to delete

      • addDeliverable

        public Document addDeliverable​(Long cardContentId,
                               Document document)
        Add the deliverable to the end of the card content.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        document - the document to use as deliverable. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • addDeliverable

        public Document addDeliverable​(Long cardContentId,
                               Document document,
                               RelatedPosition relatedPosition)
        Add the deliverable to the card content. It will be placed on the given relatedPosition.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        document - the document to use as deliverable. It must be a new document
        relatedPosition - to define the place where the deliverable will be added in the card content
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • addDeliverable

        public Document addDeliverable​(Long cardContentId,
                               Document document,
                               RelatedPosition relatedPosition,
                               Long neighbourDocId)
        Add the deliverable to the card content.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        document - the document to use as deliverable. It must be a new document
        relatedPosition - to define the place where the deliverable will be added in the card content
        neighbourDocId - the existing document which defines where the new document will be set. If relatedPosition is BEFOR or AFTER, it must be not null
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • removeDeliverable

        public void removeDeliverable​(Long cardContentId,
                              Long documentId)
        Remove the deliverable of the card content.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        documentId - the id of the document to remove from the card content

      • getSubCards

        public List<Card> getSubCards​(Long cardContentId)
        Get all sub cards of a given card content
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        Returns:
        all cards of the card content

      • getDeliverablesOfCardContent

        public List<Document> getDeliverablesOfCardContent​(Long cardContentId)
        Get the deliverables of the card content
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        Returns:
        the deliverables linked to the card content

      • getStickyNoteLinkAsSrcCardContent

        public List<StickyNoteLink> getStickyNoteLinkAsSrcCardContent​(Long cardContentId)
        Get all sticky note links whose source is the given card content
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        Returns:
        all sticky note links linked to the card content

      • checkIntegrity

        public boolean checkIntegrity​(CardContent cardContent)
        Check the integrity of the project
        Parameters:
        cardContent - the card content to check
        Returns:
        true iff the card content is complete and safe
